qr_scan_instruction_1: Make sure the QR code is clearly visible
qr_scan_instruction_2: Hold the camera close enough to capture the entire code
qr_scan_instruction_3: Ensure good lighting and avoid shadows
qr_scan_instruction_4: Keep the camera steady to avoid blurry images
qr_scan_instruction_5: The QR code should fill most of the screen
test_strip_scan_instruction_1: Place the test strip on a flat, well-lit surface
test_strip_scan_instruction_2: Hold the camera directly above the strip
test_strip_scan_instruction_3: Make sure the entire strip is visible in the frame
test_strip_scan_instruction_4: Ensure good lighting and avoid shadows
test_strip_scan_instruction_5: Keep the camera steady to avoid blurry images
test_strip_scan_instruction_6: The strip should be clearly focused and readable
upload_test_strip_instruction_1: Select a clear photo of the test strip from your gallery
upload_test_strip_instruction_2: Ensure the test strip is fully visible in the image
upload_test_strip_instruction_3: The photo should be well-lit and in focus
upload_test_strip_instruction_4: Avoid images with glare, shadows, or obstructions
upload_test_strip_instruction_5: Do not use edited or filtered images
upload_test_strip_instruction_6: If possible, use a recent photo taken under good lighting conditions
